steps.title: Welcome to the Stock Market! 📈
steps.content: Your goal is to buy and sell stocks to make as much money as you can. Think of a stock as a tiny piece of a company. If the company does well, your piece becomes more valuable!

steps.title: Buying and Selling Stocks 🛒
steps.content: To buy or sell, just click on a stock to open the trading window. You can only buy stocks if you have enough cash, and you can only sell stocks that you already own.

steps.title: Watch the News! 📰
steps.content: Keep an eye on the 'Today's News' section. Good news can make a stock's price go up, and bad news can make it go down. Use this information to make smart decisions!

steps.title: Advance to the Next Day ☀️
steps.content: When you're done buying and selling for the day, click the 'Next Day' button to see how your stocks performed. You'll also earn a little bit of interest on any cash you're not using.

steps.title: Have Fun! 🎉
steps.content: The best way to learn is by doing. Don't be afraid to experiment and see what happens. Good luck, and have fun on your quest!
